animeDescription: In this three-episode OVA, Taro learns more about Cynthia`s life as herself and her alter-ego Grace. He also undergoes training with his bodyguard Konoe. And finally, Ikuyo dupes Taro in spending a whole day disguised as a maid.    (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Mariel', 'Hanaukyou, Tarou', 'Ichigo, Sango and Ringo', 'Tsurugi, Konoe', 'Yashima, Sanae', 'Landlavizar, Cynthia', 'Suzuki, Ikuyo', 'Jihiyou, Ryuuka', 'Grace']
